select a.mard_id as mardId, a.t_quantity as subtotalQuantity, a.t_amount as subtotalAmount, ma.id as materielId, ma.name as materielName, m.sphere, m.cylinder, m.axial, t.type_name as typeName from ( SELECT soi.mard_id, sum(soi.quantity) as t_quantity, sum(soi.quantity * soi.sell_price) t_amount from sales_order so left join sales_order_item soi on so.id = soi.sales_order_id where so.delete_flag = 0 and so.order_type = '01'
and so.sale_date >= #{beginDate} and #{endDate} >= so.sale_date
GROUP BY soi.mard_id ) a left join mard m on a.mard_id = m.id left join materiel ma on m.materiel_id = ma.id left join goods_type t on ma.type_id = t.type_id where 1 = 1
and ma.type_id = #{typeId}
order by a.t_quantity desc

select a.businessman_id as adminUserId, d.real_name as adminName, a.t_quantity as subtotalQuantity, a.t_amount as subtotalAmount from ( SELECT so.businessman_id, sum(soi.quantity) as t_quantity, sum(soi.quantity * soi.sell_price) as t_amount from sales_order so left join sales_order_item soi on so.id = soi.sales_order_id where so.delete_flag = 0 and so.order_type = '01'
and so.sale_date >= #{beginDate} and #{endDate} >= so.sale_date
GROUP BY so.businessman_id ) a left join admin_user_detail d on a.businessman_id = d.admin_user_id order by a.t_amount desc

select a.store_id as storeId, s.store_name as storeName, a.t_quantity as subtotalQuantity, a.t_amount as subtotalAmount from ( SELECT so.store_id, sum(soi.quantity) as t_quantity, sum(soi.quantity * soi.sell_price) as t_amount from sales_order so left join sales_order_item soi on so.id = soi.sales_order_id where so.delete_flag = 0 and so.order_type = '01'
and so.sale_date >= #{beginDate} and #{endDate} >= so.sale_date
GROUP BY so.store_id ) a left join store s on a.store_id = s.store_id order by a.t_amount desc

SELECT a.t_quantity as subtotalQuantity, a.t_amount as subtotalAmount, s.supplier_id as supplierId, s.supplier_name as supplierName from ( SELECT po.supplier_id, sum(poi.purchase_quantity) as t_quantity, sum(poi.purchase_quantity * poi.purchase_price) as t_amount from purchase_order po left join purchase_order_item poi on po.purchase_order_id = poi.purchase_order_id where po.delete_flag = 0 and po.order_type= '01'
and po.purchase_date >= #{beginDate} and #{endDate} >= po.purchase_date
group by po.supplier_id ) a left join supplier s on a.supplier_id = s.supplier_id order by a.t_amount desc
